Text: The Indian Love Lyrics is a 1923 British silent romantic drama film directed by Sinclair Hill and starring Catherine Calvert, Owen Nares and Malvina Longfellow.

Triplets:<The Indian Love Lyrics

Text: The Indian Love Lyrics:  It is based on the poem "The Garden of Kama" by Laurence Hope.

Text: The Indian Love Lyrics:  The film's sets were designed by art director Walter Murton.
